keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.XCS

Class PredictionArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.XCS.PredictionArray

  • public class PredictionArray
extends java.lang.Object

    This class will construct the prediction array from a given match set.

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Albert Orriols (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 03/12/2008

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PredictionArray(Population pop)
      Constructs the prediction array.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int chooseExploreAction()
      It chooses a random action in the prediction array.
      double get(int action)
      Returns the value of that position in the prediction array
      int getBestAction()
      Returns the best action in the prediction array.
      double getBestValue()
      Returns the best action in the prediction array.
      int howManyBestActions()
      Returns the number of "best actions" in the prediction array.
      void print()
      Prints the prediction array to the standard output.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PredictionArray

        public PredictionArray(Population pop)

        Constructs the prediction array.

        Parameters:
        pop - is the population for which the prediction array has to be created.

    • Method Detail

      • getBestAction

        public int getBestAction()

        Returns the best action in the prediction array. If there are more than one "best action" it selects one randomly.

        Returns:
        a int with the best action.

      • getBestValue

        public double getBestValue()

        Returns the best action in the prediction array.

        Returns:
        an integer with the best action.

      • howManyBestActions

        public int howManyBestActions()

        Returns the number of "best actions" in the prediction array. If there are more than one "best action",it implies that it cannot be classified (the system cannot decide, without a stochastic method ,the best action).

        Returns:
        a int with the number of best actions in the prediction array.

      • chooseExploreAction

        public int chooseExploreAction()

        It chooses a random action in the prediction array.

        Returns:
        a int with the random action chosen.

      • get

        public double get(int action)

        Returns the value of that position in the prediction array

        Parameters:
        action - is the action we want to know the value.
        Returns:
        a double with the value in that position.

      • print

        public void print()

        Prints the prediction array to the standard output.
